Module com.example.dmscoursework
Package com.example.dmscoursework.View.Level

Class LevelManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.dmscoursework.View.Level.LevelManager
public class LevelManager extends Object
The LevelManager is in charge of the levels and it specifies what themed levels should be generated. It has one responsibility in making sure that the levels work correctly and that one can transition from level to level smoothly.
Since:
04-01-2022
Version:
1.0
Author:
William Michiel Simson van Dijkhuizen
